Feat Count: General: 5 Selectable Feature Count: Monk (Monastic Tradition)
Feats: Keen Mind; Mobile; Mounted Combatant; Observant; Resilient Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment; Language (Common; Choose 1 from any) Monk Features: Arms Of The Astral Self; Awakened Astral Self; Body Of The Astral Self; Dedicated Weapon; Deflect Missiles; Diamond Soul; Empty Body; Evasion; Extra Attack; Flurry Of Blows; Flurry Of Healing And Harm; Focused Aim; Hand Of Harm; Hand Of Healing; Hand Of Ultimate Mercy; Implements Of Mercy; Ki-Empowered Strikes; Ki-Fueled Attack; Ki; Martial Arts; Monastic Tradition; Patient Defense; Perfect Self; Physician's Touch; Purity Of Body; Quickened Healing; Save Proficiency (Strength; Dexterity); Skill Proficiency (Choose 2 from Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, Stealth); Slow Fall; Step Of The Wind; Stillness Of Mind; Stunning Strike; Timeless Body (Monk); Tongue Of The Sun And Moon; Tool Proficiency (Choose 1 from any Artisan, any Musical); Unarmored Defense (Monk); Unarmored Movement; Visage Of The Astral Self; Way Of Mercy; Way Of The Astral Self; Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons; Shortsword) Acolyte Features: Language (Choose 2 from any); Shelter Of The Faithful; Skill Proficiency (Insight; Religion)
Feature Notes:
Monastic Tradition: 1 selection
Implements Of Mercy: Owns a mask associated w/the Way Of Mercy
Keen Mind: Always knows the direction of north and hours until sunrise or sunset/Can recall anything seen or heard during the past month
Ki: Can use 20 Ki Points per short rest
Observant: Can read lips
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of NH-Rillifane Rallathil and fellow believers
Timeless Body (Monk): Suffers no debility from aging and needs no food or water
Tongue Of The Sun And Moon: Can communicate in any language
Visage Of The Astral Self: May spend 1 Ki Point and use a bonus action to gain 120' Darkvision, R600' voice, and R60' private voice for 10 min
Skill Proficiency: Athletics; History; Insight; Medicine; Religion
Skills:
Acrobatics: (dex) 2 Insight: (wis) 9 Performance: (cha) 0
Animal Handling: (wis) 3 Intimidation: (cha) 0 Persuasion: (cha) 0
Arcana: (int) 3 Investigation: (int) 3 Religion: (int) 9
Athletics: (str) 6 Medicine: (wis) 9 Sleight Of Hand: (dex) 2
Deception: (cha) 0 Nature: (int) 3 Stealth: (dex) 2
History: (int) 9 Perception: (wis) 3 Survival: (wis) 3
Tool Proficiency: Herbalism Kit; Painter's Supplies
Languages: Common; Draconic; Giant; Halfling
Skill Notes:
Implements Of Mercy: Skill Proficiency (Insight; Medicine)/Tool Proficiency (Herbalism Kit)
Observant: +5 passive Investigation and passive Perception
Visage Of The Astral Self: May spend 1 Ki Point and use a bonus action to gain Adv on Insight and Intimidation for 10 min
Combat
Hit Points: 121 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 15 Attacks Per Round: 2
Weapon Proficiency: Shortsword; Simple Weapons
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Club (+8 1d4+2); Greatclub (+6 1d8); Unarmed (+8 1d10+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Martial Arts: When unarmored, gains +2 attack and damage with monk weapons and raises damage die to 1d10
Unarmored Defense (Monk): +3 Armor Class in no armor
Arms Of The Astral Self: May spend 1 Ki and use a bonus action to inflict 2d10 HP force (DC 17 Dexterity neg) to targets in a 10' radius; self gains +5' unarmed reach, +1 unarmed attack, and +1 HP force unarmed damage for 10 min
Awakened Astral Self: May spend 5 Ki Points and use a bonus action to gain +2 Armor Class and a third Arms Of The Astral Self attack each rd
Body Of The Astral Self: While using both Arms and Visage Of The Astral Self, may use Reaction to negate 1d10+3 HP acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder damage and may inflict +1d10 HP damage w/Arms Of The Astral Self 1/rd
Dedicated Weapon: May designate a non-heavy weapon as monk weapon 1/short rest
Deflect Missiles: Can use a reaction to reduce missile damage by 1d10+22 HP; reducing it to 0 hit points allows spending 1 Ki Point to make an immediate attack
Flurry Of Blows: Can spend 1 Ki Point to make 2 unarmed strikes as a bonus action
Flurry Of Healing And Harm: May substitute Hand Of Healing for each Flurry Of Blows strike/May add Hand Of Harm to one Flurry Of Blows strike
Focused Aim: May spend 1/2/3 Ki Points to add 2/4/6 to a failed attack roll
Hand Of Harm: May spend 1 Ki Point to inflict +1d10+3 HP necrotic w/unarmed strike 1/rd
Hand Of Healing: May spend 1 Ki Point or forego 1 Flurry Of Blows strike to use touch to restore 1d10+3 HP
Ki-Empowered Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as magical
Ki-Fueled Attack: Performing an action that spends a Ki Point allows using a bonus action to attack w/a monk weapon
Martial Arts: When unarmored, can use a bonus action to make an unarmed strike after a monk weapon attack
Mobile: Can Dash at full speed in difficult terrain/Attacking a target does not provoke an opportunity attack
Mounted Combatant: Has advantage on melee attacks on an unmounted foe smaller than mount and can redirect attacks on mount to self
Patient Defense: Can spend 1 Ki Point to Dodge as a bonus action
Perfect Self: Has a minimum of 4 Ki Points available after initiative
Physician's Touch: May use Hand Of Healing to end disease or condition/May use Hand Of Harm to inflict poisoned for 1 rd
Quickened Healing: May spend 2 Ki Points to regain 1d10+6 HP
Step Of The Wind: Can spend 1 Ki Point to double jump distance and to Disengage or Dash as a bonus action
Stunning Strike: Can spend 1 Ki Point after a successful attack to stun the target (save DC 17 Constitution negates) for 1 rd
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Constitution; Dexterity; Intelligence; Strength; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 6; Constitution: 8; Dexterity: 8; Intelligence: 9; Strength: 6; Wisdom: 9
Save Notes:
Diamond Soul: Proficient on all saves
Resilient: Save Proficiency (Choose 1 from any)
Diamond Soul: Can spend 1 Ki Point to reroll a save
Evasion: Successful Dexterity saves yield no damage instead of half, and failures yield half damage
Mounted Combatant: Mount suffers no damage on a successful Dexterity save and half on failure
Purity Of Body: Has immunity to disease and poison
Stillness Of Mind: Can use an action to end charm or fright affecting self
Magic
Attack: Monk: 9 Spell DC: Monk: 17
Spells: Astral Projection (Monk9 [Empty Body] Necr): R10' Self and 8 willing targets project to astral plane
Magic Notes:
Empty Body: Can spend 4 Ki Points to become invisible and gain resistance to all damage other than force for 1 min/Can spend 8 Ki Points to cast Astral Projection on self
Hand Of Ultimate Mercy: May spend 5 Ki Points to revive a day-old corpse 1/long rest, restoring 4d10+3 HP and removing conditions

Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
